name: Esha Resume
body:
**Esha Desai**
(Ruby on Rails – 4 years)
M: 8000311998, Ph: 079-26301006
Email: eshadesai_88@yahoo.co.in
DOB: 14th May 1988

Career Objective: To be associated with a progressive organization which gives me scope to apply my knowledge and skills as well as develop them further. Would like to perform and thereby exceed the commitments for the position I would work for.

Technical Details:
Languages: Ruby(1.9, 1.8), HTML, Drupal(basic)
OS: ubuntu
Framework: Rails(3.x, 2.x), Javascript, Jquery

**Work Experience:**
	
Software Engineer

February 2011 - Till Date
Priya softwebsolutions
	Ahmedabad,Gujarat.

July 2009 – February 2011
Gloscon Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
Ahmedabad,Gujarat.


**Projects Undertaken:**

**- Created one gem for NMI payment gateway - https://github.com/eshashah/nmi**

**1. Local Merchant Loyalty Program (LMLP): **
LMLP is a loyalty program for small merchants who typically operate 1 to 10 stores. The system provides all of the features necessary to accomplish the following:
a. Authentication
b. Configuration
c. Operation
d. Reporting
e. Campaign management (Member Communications)
f. Merchant account management
g. Interfaces to third party systems
h. Batch Computation

Skill Set: Ruby 1.9, Rails 3.2.12 , Mysql

2. Harmony healthcare:
An online registry for patient information at Harmony Healthcare included:
a. Registration for patients and concerned physicians for diseases and medics
b. Ajax based search facility for patients
c. LDAP integration for authentication
d. Customized report generation tool
e. PDF merger for patient details, every year
f. Security management as per standards

Skill Set: Ruby 1.9, Rails 3.1.x, Mysql


3. Impact energies:
http://ftv.impactenergies.com is an online information resource about re-inventing the way clean energy products reach the world's poorest consumers. The proprietary cloud-based platform with SMS capabilities, give their partners the ability to manage inventory and help partners along the supply chain to facilitate information sharing.
Skill Set: Ruby 1.9, Rails 3.2.12 , Mysql

4. MCT(myCalltime)
www.mycalltime.com is a powerful new way of creating and distributing paperless call sheets for films, commercials, television, music, video and photo productions.
a. Callsheet 
b. Holdsheet

Skill Set: Ruby 1.8, Rails 2.3.x , Mysql

5. Movie Review
Created webservice for a movie review website.

Skill Set: Ruby 1.8, Rails 2.3.x , Mysql

6. Citiplots: 
www.citiplots.com is an online real estate site for buying or selling property. Worked on validation part of registration of new user, validation in new property post section and twitter integration.

Skill Set: Ruby 1.8, Rails 2.x , Mysql

**7. Donorshouse:**
www.donorshouse.com is an online registry for blood and organ donation. I worked on following sections.
a. Registration for Donors and Organ seekers
b. Search facility for donors and organ seekers
c. Organ donation trend of current year
d. Community
e. Videos
f. Photo album
g. Twitter integration for new user
h. Share story section

Skill Set: Ruby 1.8, Rails 2.x , Mysql

8. Gujarat Cricket: 
www.gujaratcricket.com is an online portal for organizing the matches held between the registered clubs. I worked on following sections:
a. Photo and Video uploading section
b. New match creation and schedule for that match
c. Data entry for each player after match
d. Scorecard generation
e. Blog section
f. Headline and Expert diary section

Skill Set: Ruby 1.8, Rails 2.x , Mysql

9. Roshanshah:
www.roshanshah.com is website for posting podcast and blogs. It is made with Drupal 7.

Skill Set: Drupal, Mysql


Education and Qualification:
2005 – 2009 – SVIT, Gujarat University
Computer Engineering: 	65.66%
2004 – 2005 – H.S.C(Science):		62.67%
2002 – 2003 – S.S.C:			87%

**Achievements:**

1. Gave seminar on Ruby on Rails at Visnagar college.
2. Won 3rd prize in science fair, a state level competition.
3. Participated in inter college competition - Prakarsh ’06
4. Poster presentation.
5. Attended Photoshop, PC Basic, Java and flash workshop.
6. Attended Bootcamp of Kosansh health care solution.
